scripts.accessibility: docker run --rm -e CI=true -e APP_DIR=apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel):/work -w /work/apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/node_modules:/work/node_modules -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/docs/accessibility/report:/work/docs/playwright/report e2e bun x playwright test --config=playwright.storybook.config.ts e2e/accessibility
scripts.e2e: docker run --rm -e CI=true -e APP_DIR=apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel):/work -w /work -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/node_modules:/work/node_modules -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/docs/playwright/report:/work/docs/playwright/report -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/docs/security/e2e:/work/docs/security/e2e e2e
scripts.interactions: docker run --rm -e CI=true -e APP_DIR=apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel):/work -w /work/apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/node_modules:/work/node_modules -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/docs/interactions/report:/work/docs/playwright/report e2e bun x playwright test --config=playwright.storybook.config.ts e2e/storybook/interactions
scripts.snapshot: docker run --rm -e CI=true -e APP_DIR=apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel):/work -w /work/apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/node_modules:/work/node_modules -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/docs/playwright/report:/work/docs/playwright/report e2e bun x playwright test --project=chromium --update-snapshots
scripts.visual: docker run --rm -e CI=true -e APP_DIR=apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel):/work -w /work/apps/web -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/node_modules:/work/node_modules -v $(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/docs/visual/report:/work/docs/playwright/report e2e bun x playwright test --config=playwright.storybook.config.ts e2e/storybook/visual
